Title: Gabbar is Back
Writer: A.R. Murugadoss (story), Rajat Arora (additional screenplay), Rajat Arora (dialogue), D.S. Kannan
Actors: Akshay Kumar, Kareena Kapoor, Chitrangda Singh, Shruti Haasan
Plot: A grief-stricken man takes the law into his own hands when he begins to kidnap and murder corrupt public servants.
